## ComponentType type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type ComponentType<P extends object> = FunctionComponentTyp<P> | ClassComponentTyp<P, AnyState> | DeferredClassComponentTyp<P, AnyState> | PrimitiveClassComponentTyp<P>;
```
